audio-effects.title: Audio effects
audio-effects.description: Adds sound effects to the site: background music, hover and click sounds for links and buttons, etc.

bg-canvas.title: Dynamic background
bg-canvas.description: Allows you to set control points between which the page background will change dynamically.

bg-colors.title: Background colors
bg-colors.description: Reference colors for sections by which the background of the page will change when scrolling.

bg-slides.title: Background slideshow
bg-slides.description: Add images as background to Elementor's sections and change its with pan and kenburn effects.

charts.title: Charts
charts.description: Adds a shortcode for creating different types of graphs and charts.

expand-collapse.title: Expand / Collapse
expand-collapse.description: Allows you to show more content in less area.

image-effects.title: Image effects
image-effects.description: Adds modern image hover effects based on WebGL distortions.

image-mask.title: Image as a mask
image-mask.description: Show parts of elements through the opaque areas of the picture.

image-scroll.title: Image scroll
image-scroll.description: Scroll large image inside the fixed viewport on the mouse hover.

mouse-helper.title: Mouse helper
mouse-helper.description: Displays dynamic suggestions when the mouse hovers over various page objects.

secondary-image.title: Secondary image
secondary-image.description: Allows you to specify an additional image, which is displayed when the mouse is hovered over the featured image.

smoke.title: Smoke / Fog
smoke.description: Adds a shortcode that creates smoke (fog) following the mouse cursor.
